name: surf
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
